parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.56

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Eden Editor

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Return all entities and sub-layer in [[Eden Entity]] layer.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''get3DENLayerEntities''' layerID
</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> layerID: [[Number]] - layer ID as returned by [[add3DENLayer]] command
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] of [[Eden Entity|Eden Entities]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_myLayer = -1 [[add3DENLayer]] "CTRG";
[[player]] [[set3DENLayer]] _myLayer;
_entities = [[get3DENLayerEntities]] _myLayer;
</code>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value>
[[add3DENLayer]]
[[remove3DENLayer]]
[[set3DENLayer]]
[[getMissionLayerEntities]]
</value></part></template></root>
